title: Design and Application of a Neural Network-Based Earthquake Early Warning System Prediction Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational data analysis and machine learning concepts, basic Python programming
context.additional_context: Pedagogical competency development program for pre-service/in-service teachers. Exploring educational applications of earthquake prediction models

learning_goals: Learners can explain the workflow for designing a neural network model using earthquake data.
Learners can build a predictive model based on historical earthquake data and interpret R², MAE, and MSE metrics.
Learners can implement earthquake impact visualization using GeoPandas and Folium and utilize it as educational material.

resources: Python-Based Neural Network Model Sample Code

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
